summary: Comprehensive testing of Competitive Intelligence Agent app. Backend APIs fully functional locally, frontend UI renders correctly, but external URL integration completely broken preventing end-to-end functionality.

critical_bugs.issue: External URL https://eo4ki5dwmeoq59x.stage-preview.emergentagent.com returns 404 for all API endpoints
critical_bugs.impact: Blocks all frontend-backend integration via external URL

integration_issues.issue: Frontend configured to use external URL for API calls but external URL routing is not working
Login and registration fail due to backend API 404 errors from external URL

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: External URL routing is completely broken. The deployment/infrastructure configuration needs to be fixed. External URL https://eo4ki5dwmeoq59x.stage-preview.emergentagent.com shows 'Preview Unavailable!!!' instead of the app and returns 404 for all API endpoints. All backend APIs work perfectly on localhost:8001 and frontend renders correctly on localhost:3000, but integration fails due to external URL issues. This is a deployment infrastructure problem, not a code issue.
